mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tim_goodsinfo WHERE goods_state NOT IN ('end') order by seq_goods desc
SELECT * FROM tim_goodsinfo WHERE goods_state NOT IN ('end') and goods_mid = #{goodsMid} order by seq_goods desc
SELECT * FROM tim_goodsinfo WHERE goods_state NOT IN ('end') and goods_catename IN( select b_cate from tim_categori where t_cate = #{tcate} ) order by seq_goods desc
SELECT * FROM tim_goodsinfo WHERE goods_state NOT IN ('end') and goods_catename = #{bcate} order by seq_goods desc
SELECT * FROM tim_goodsinfo WHERE goods_state NOT IN ('end') AND goods_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY seq_goods DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tim_goodsinfo (seq_goods, goods_name, goods_price, goods_inven, goods_state, goods_mid, goods_catename, goods_mdate, goods_rdate) values (seq_goods.nextVal, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsInven}, #{goodsState}, #{goodsMid}, #{goodsCatename}, sysdate, sysdate)
